name: Giants! (Demo)
description:
FEATURES

- Old school gameplay with new improvements

- A bright and vibrant visual style

-Lots of memorable NPCs

- Epic Boss Battles

-Challenging Platforming

OVERVIEW

Giants! is a fun shooter/platformer drawing inspiration from classic games like Megaman and Contra. It's currently just a demo with many new levels and features to be brought in. If you feel so inclined, any feedback would be greatly appreaciated in helping to improve the game. Enjoy!

STORY

1000 years ago "Jack the Giant Slayer"  fought off hordes of Giants and led humanity to victory over the beasts. For centuries, people enjoyed a peaceful existance until one day the Giants returned. To combat the beasts, the "Giant Slayers" were formed. You play as the newest recruit of the slayers, and you must head out to save and protect humanity.
